hero.title: CloserStill Media
hero.subtitle: Global leader in organizing professional trade fairs and B2B events. Enabler of the Digital Commerce Data Space in Spain.

profile.title: Corporate Profile
profile.paragraph1: CloserStill Media is the global leader in organizing professional trade fairs and B2B events. In Spain, it manages the most powerful networking ecosystem in the market, connecting supply and demand through "umbrella event" strategies that bring together C-Level executives from multiple verticals in the same venue.
profile.paragraph2: Its approach spans from critical technology infrastructure to digital retail and the pharmaceutical sector, acting as the main driver of in-person business in Madrid and Barcelona.

ecosystems.title: Connected Ecosystems Portfolio
ecosystems.description: Through this alliance, ProcureData enables data interoperability in the following key events:

barcelona.name: Barcelona Digital Hub
barcelona.description: Focus on digital business and retail transformation

health.name: Health & Pharma Sector
health.description: Leading events in pharmaceutical and dental sector

eforums.title: eForums (One to One)
eforums.description: Private executive "speed dating" meetings powered by pre-validated identity verification

valueProposition.title: Joint Value Proposition
valueProposition.description: The ProcureData x CloserStill alliance transforms trade fairs into Liquid Data Spaces

fastTrack.title: Commercial Fast-Track
fastTrack.description: Exhibitors and visitors use their ProcureData Digital Passport to instantly validate credentials (Solvency, ISOs, ESG) when scanning their badge.

dataSpace.title: Federated Data Space
dataSpace.description: We enable CloserStill to act as orchestrator of the 'Digital Commerce Data Space', allowing exhibitors to access Data Space Kit funding.

matchmaking.title: Verified Matchmaking
matchmaking.description: At eForums, we ensure every 'One to One' meeting occurs between pre-approved parties, eliminating post-event compliance friction.

leads.title: Sovereign Lead Exchange
leads.description: Use of EDC connectors to share contact data under ODRL contracts

certification.title: Attendance Certification
certification.description: Issuance of verifiable credentials for participation and training on blockchain

cta.title: Are you an exhibitor at CloserStill events?
cta.description: Access the advantages of the Data Space Kit and optimize your participation with instant business credential validation.
